attributes.action: Enforce the law regarding praying in parks,streets and other public places.
attributes.background: Stop ALL religious prayers and worship from all religious groups.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

There are no laws that prevent praying in public, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

The UK Parliament and Government aren't responsible for enforcing the Royal Parks collective worship policies.

You can contact the Royal Parks here: 

https://www.royalparks.org.uk/about-us/contact-us
